generated_description: emergent biosolutions canada inc. is a company based in mississauga, ontario. the company specializes in the development and distribution of narcan nasal spray, a pure opioid antagonist used for emergency use to reverse known or suspected opioid overdose. the product is administered by non-healthcare professionals before professional medical assistance becomes available. collaborates with pharmacists to provide resources and education on the use of narcan nasal spray and its role in addressing the opioid crisis.
